header.h2: Remote Access for Board Meeting on Thursday, April 30, 2020 at 3:00 p.m.

div.p:
Please click "Read Full Story" for meeting details and access to the proposed budget.
Instructions for observing / participating in the Public Hearing remotely are as follows in two options:
1. Join Zoom meeting online: copy the link below into your internet browser, hit “ENTER” and follow the prompts to enter your name and click “Join now”
https://zoom.us/j/93176621069?pwd=SUhqWW5LRDBicHE2eFBJd2JFYkdSdz09
2. Dial in via phone
Dial-in number: +1 929 436 2866
Meeting ID: 931 7662 1069
Password: 882433
The Public is strongly encouraged to participate by going on-line if at all possible, rather than just calling in.

div.div: Location: Huber Street Elementary School, 1520 Paterson Plank Rd, Secaucus, NJ 07094, USA
Location: Huber Street Elementary School, 1520 Paterson Plank Rd, Secaucus, NJ 07094, USA
Location: Huber Street Elementary School, 1520 Paterson Plank Rd, Secaucus, NJ 07094, USA
Location: Huber Street Elementary School, 1520 Paterson Plank Rd, Secaucus, NJ 07094, USA

The Secaucus School District, in cooperation with our diverse community, is committed
to a safe, nurturing environment that upholds a tradition of engaging instruction,
innovative curricula, challenging academics, and expansive co-curricular programs
thereby providing our students with a comprehensive education that cultivates potential,
encourages fair play, inspires creativity, and fosters multi-faceted life skills necessary to
brave the challenges of the future.

article.aria-label: Remote Access for Board Meeting on Thursday, April 30, 2020 at 3:00 p.m.

h3.a: Remote Access for Board Meeting on Thursday, April 30, 2020 at 3:00 p.m.

div.div:
Please click "Read Full Story" for meeting details and access to the proposed budget.
Instructions for observing / participating in the Public Hearing remotely are as follows in two options: 1. Join Zoom meeting online: copy the link below into your internet browser, hit “ENTER” and follow the prompts to enter your name and click “Join now” https://zoom.us/j/93176621069?pwd=SUhqWW5LRDBicHE2eFBJd2JFYkdSdz09
2. Dial in via phone Dial-in number: +1 929 436 2866 Meeting ID: 931 7662 1069 Password: 882433
The Public is strongly encouraged to participate by going on-line if at all possible, rather than just calling in.

article.aria-label: Secaucus School District will remain closed and continue to use the District’s Distance Learning Plan through, at least, Friday, April 17th.

h3.a: Secaucus School District will remain closed and continue to use the District’s Distance Learning Plan through, at least, Friday, April 17th.

div.div: The District Distance Learning Plan will be continuously updated and can be found under DISTANCE LEARNING on this webpage.

The Secaucus Summer 2020 Extended School Year will run 4 days a week (Monday through Thursday) from Monday, July 13th to Thursday, August 13th at Clarendon School.
If your child is eligible for our Extended School Year Program, look under "Parents" at the top of the website, or click this, for details.
